Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Triangle

  • public class Triangle
extends java.lang.Object
    The basic class representing Right Angled Triangles
    Version:
    18-August-2018
    Author:
    Saurav Pradhan, Aditya Ketkar, Mehul Kasliwal, Raghav Agrawal

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int base
      It stores the value of base of right angled triangle.
      private char colour
      It stores the value of colour of right-angled triangle.
      Ex: 'r' for Red, 'b' for Blue , 'p' for pink etc
      private int height
      It stores the value of height of right-angled triangle.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Triangle​(int height, int base, char colour)
      The constructor for class Triangle.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getArea​()
      The method returns the area of the right-angled triangle, which can be calculated using fields height and base.
      char getColour​()
      The method returns the colour of the right-angled triangle, which is stored in the field colour.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • height

        private int height
        It stores the value of height of right-angled triangle.

      • base

        private int base
        It stores the value of base of right angled triangle.

      • colour

        private char colour
        It stores the value of colour of right-angled triangle.
        Ex: 'r' for Red, 'b' for Blue , 'p' for pink etc

    • Constructor Detail

      • Triangle

        public Triangle​(int height,
                int base,
                char colour)
        The constructor for class Triangle. The constructor takes three parameters height, base and colour assigns these values to height, base and colour fields of class Triangle respectively.
        Parameters:
        height - int value equal to height of right-angled triangle
        base - int value equal to base of right-angled triangle
        colour - char value equal to colour of the right-angled triangle

    • Method Detail

      • getArea

        public int getArea​()
        The method returns the area of the right-angled triangle, which can be calculated using fields height and base.
        Note: This is a int calculation. Do not use any other datatype. The values for height and base are even so the integer calculation can be performed in any order.
        Returns:
        returns a int value which is area of right-angled triangle

      • getColour

        public char getColour​()
        The method returns the colour of the right-angled triangle, which is stored in the field colour.
        Returns:
        returns a char value for the colour of right-angled triangle.
